name: Galaxy Maze
description:
In the year 3723, the Sun exploded.

The Earth needs to travel throughout the Galaxy to find a new Star.

It will be a long and dangerous journey.

By collecting enough Energy, the Earth will be able to activate the Stargate to travel faster across the Galaxy.

Tilt your device to control the Earth. 50 unlocked levels.

Complete each level as fast as you can to take the lead in Game Center.
